Posts.Content: Ahhh yes I have a 20 year old and 23 and they r like mum r u getting ur boob out again lol ..I'm waiting on a second dx test f chemo results...did u not have radiotherapy then either xxxx

Posts.Content: Hi how r u coping with the tamoxifen..I been told from dx no chemo and no radiotherapy so was over the moon however I have to start tamoxifen and zoladex injections every 4 weeks xx

Posts.Content: Hi I have had one side mastectomy lymph node immediate implant reconstruction age 46 ..3 weeks ago ..still in pain in my breast very full and swollen no redness ..my doctor said everything looks okay just wondering if any one else discomfort lasted this long )
